name: p-cool
description: This module is a follow up of [this Medium post](https://webreflection.medium.com/about-web-components-cc3e8b4035b0).

scripts.build: npm run rollup && node copy.js && npm run size
scripts.rollup: rollup --config rollup/index.config.js && rollup --config rollup/poly.config.js && rollup --config rollup/min.config.js
scripts.size: echo 'Default'; cat index.js | brotli | wc -c && echo ''; echo 'Poly'; terser poly.js --module -m -c | brotli | wc -c && echo ''; echo 'Min'; cat min.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
